Name: Inclement
About the game: Early 1832, You invest all of your life savings on a small plot of land and an old house located in the harsh environment of Northern Europe in hopes of a new life and success. In this farm-building strategy game set in the inclement weather of Northern Europe, you will have to manage your land from clearing forests for farming and selling grain at the neighbouring town to building barns and eventually oil rigs and even shipyards. Your right decisions will allow you to develop, and eventually grow your wealth. The success of your farm depends on the appropriate management of your wealth and expensive resources. Features ♦ Elegant, Minimalistic Pixel Art ♦ Many buildings ♦ Multiple endings ♦ Over 3 hours of gameplay ♦ Achievements
